description: Carolina fanwort is an amazing aquatic plant species renowned for its eye-catching beauty and ability to increase the oxygen levels in the water. Its fan-shaped bright green foliage and delicate white flowers make it a popular addition to any pond or aquarium. Its unique ability to grow in shallow water makes it a great plant for those who have limited space. Though a fast-growing species, Carolina fanwort is easy to maintain and will flourish with proper care. Its distinctive looks and the added benefits it brings to the water make it a valuable plant for any water garden.
